title: Cannot connect to VPN
description: VPN client shows connection error when trying to connect from home
resolution: Updated VPN client to latest version and reconfigured server settings. Connection successful after update.

title: Password expired
description: User unable to login due to expired password
resolution: Guided user through self-service password reset portal. Password updated successfully.

title: Outlook not syncing
description: Emails not syncing in Outlook desktop client
resolution: Removed and re-added email account. Cleared Outlook cache. Sync working normally.

title: Printer offline
description: Cannot print to Floor 2 East printer
resolution: Printer was powered off. Turned on printer and restarted print spooler service on user's computer.

title: Slow computer performance
description: Computer running very slow and freezing
resolution: Ran disk cleanup and removed startup programs. Freed up 50GB of disk space. Performance improved.

title: Cannot access shared drive
description: Getting access denied error when accessing shared folder
resolution: Added user to appropriate security group. Access granted within 15 minutes.

title: MFA not working
description: Not receiving MFA codes on phone
resolution: Phone number in system was outdated. Updated phone number and re-enrolled in MFA.

title: Software installation request
description: Need Adobe Acrobat Pro for contract review
resolution: Verified business justification and manager approval. Installed Adobe Acrobat Pro from Software Center.

title: Email signature missing
description: Email signature disappeared after Outlook update
resolution: Recreated email signature in Outlook settings. Provided template for consistent formatting.

title: Wi-Fi keeps disconnecting
description: Laptop disconnects from Wi-Fi every few minutes
resolution: Updated Wi-Fi drivers and disabled power saving mode for network adapter. Connection stable.

title: Cannot join Teams meeting
description: Teams shows error when trying to join video call
resolution: Cleared Teams cache and reinstalled application. Teams working properly.

title: Forgot username
description: User cannot remember username for login
resolution: Retrieved username from Active Directory based on employee ID. User able to login.

title: Laptop won't turn on
description: Laptop shows no signs of power
resolution: Battery was completely drained. Charged for 30 minutes and laptop powered on successfully.

title: Need access to finance folder
description: Require read access to finance shared drive
resolution: Submitted access request with manager approval. Access granted to finance folder.

title: Spam emails
description: Receiving excessive spam in inbox
resolution: Added sender domains to block list. Configured spam filter rules. Spam reduced significantly.

title: Monitor not working
description: External monitor not detected
resolution: Replaced faulty display cable. Monitor detected and working.

title: VPN very slow
description: VPN connection extremely slow making work difficult
resolution: Switched user to different VPN server with lower load. Connection speed improved.

title: Cannot install software
description: Getting permission error when installing approved software
resolution: Granted temporary admin rights. Software installed successfully. Admin rights revoked.

title: Keyboard keys not working
description: Several keyboard keys not responding
resolution: Cleaned keyboard and tested. Keys still not working. Replaced keyboard.

title: Account locked
description: Account locked after multiple failed login attempts
resolution: Unlocked account and verified correct password with user. Reminded about password policy.

title: OneDrive not syncing
description: Files not syncing to OneDrive
resolution: Reset OneDrive sync. Cleared cache. Files syncing properly now.

title: Printer printing blank pages
description: Printer prints but pages are blank
resolution: Toner cartridge was empty. Replaced toner cartridge. Printing normally.

title: Cannot send large email
description: Error when trying to send email with large attachment
resolution: Attachment exceeded 25MB limit. Uploaded file to OneDrive and shared link instead.

title: Zoom audio not working
description: Others cannot hear me in Zoom meetings
resolution: Microphone was muted in Windows settings. Enabled microphone and adjusted permissions.

title: Need new laptop
description: Current laptop is 6 years old and very slow
resolution: Submitted hardware refresh request. New laptop approved and ordered.

title: Excel crashing
description: Excel crashes when opening large spreadsheets
resolution: Increased Excel memory allocation. Disabled unnecessary add-ins. Excel stable now.

title: Cannot access intranet
description: Getting 403 error when accessing company intranet
resolution: User was not connected to VPN. Connected to VPN and intranet accessible.

title: Mobile email not working
description: Cannot receive emails on iPhone
resolution: Email account expired on device. Re-authenticated with current password. Email working.

title: Webcam not working
description: Camera not detected in Teams
resolution: Updated webcam drivers. Granted camera permissions to Teams. Camera working.

title: Need software license
description: License expired for AutoCAD
resolution: Renewed AutoCAD license. License key updated in software.

title: Computer won't wake from sleep
description: Laptop screen stays black after sleep
resolution: Updated BIOS and graphics drivers. Adjusted power management settings. Issue resolved.

title: Deleted file recovery
description: Accidentally deleted important file
resolution: Recovered file from OneDrive recycle bin. Restored to original location.

title: Cannot print double-sided
description: Duplex printing option not available
resolution: Enabled duplex printing in printer properties. Feature now available.

title: Outlook rules not working
description: Email rules stopped working after update
resolution: Recreated email rules. Tested and confirmed rules working correctly.

title: Blue screen error
description: Computer showing blue screen on startup
resolution: Ran hardware diagnostics. Found faulty RAM. Replaced RAM module.

title: SharePoint access denied
description: Cannot access team SharePoint site
resolution: Added user to SharePoint group. Access granted immediately.

title: Headset not working
description: USB headset not recognized
resolution: Tried different USB port. Updated audio drivers. Headset working.

title: Calendar sync issues
description: Calendar not syncing between devices
resolution: Removed and re-added Exchange account on mobile. Calendar syncing properly.

title: Application won't launch
description: Software shows error on startup
resolution: Repaired application installation. Application launches successfully.

title: Network drive disconnected
description: Mapped drive shows as disconnected
resolution: Reconnected to VPN. Remapped network drive. Drive accessible.

title: PDF won't open
description: Getting error when opening PDF files
resolution: Adobe Reader was corrupted. Reinstalled Adobe Reader. PDFs opening normally.

title: Mouse not working
description: Wireless mouse not responding
resolution: Replaced mouse batteries. Re-paired Bluetooth connection. Mouse working.

title: Screen flickering
description: Monitor screen flickering constantly
resolution: Updated graphics drivers. Adjusted refresh rate to 60Hz. Flickering stopped.

title: Cannot download attachment
description: Email attachments won't download
resolution: Mailbox was at quota limit. Archived old emails. Attachments downloading now.

title: VPN certificate expired
description: VPN shows certificate error
resolution: Renewed VPN certificate. Pushed new certificate to user's device. VPN connecting.

title: Touchpad not working
description: Laptop touchpad not responding
resolution: Touchpad was disabled via function key. Re-enabled touchpad. Working normally.

title: Need admin rights
description: Need temporary admin to install driver
resolution: Granted temporary admin rights for 1 hour. Driver installed. Rights revoked.

title: Duplicate emails
description: Receiving duplicate copies of every email
resolution: Found duplicate email account configuration. Removed duplicate account. Issue resolved.

title: Barcode scanner not working
description: USB barcode scanner not scanning
resolution: Scanner driver not installed. Installed manufacturer driver. Scanner working.

title: Computer fan loud
description: Laptop fan running very loud constantly
resolution: Cleaned dust from vents and fan. Applied new thermal paste. Fan noise reduced.
